_header: Through my right hand a nail was driven
Note: Formerly 1565; follows 5480; cf. 6713; see also 804 etc.
_description: The Appeal of Christ from the Cross with a 4-line introduction — fourteen couplets

CULMm441.First Lines:
Thurwe my ryȝt hande a nayle was driuenþer on þou
                    think ȝif þou wilt lyuen…
CULMm441.Last Lines:
…how þai be nailid to þe trethane me þerof it
                    was for þe
CULMm441.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 9 (lacks introduction).
